Reset.Title: Initialize contents
Reset.Confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all contents and go back to the beginning? This action cannot be undone.

SignOut.Title: Sign Out
SignOut.Confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out? Your progress will be saved.

Name.Prompt: Please let the AI know the name or nickname you would like to be referred to as.

Narrative.Title: Jot down Your Story of Difficulty
Narrative.Prompt: Everyone has their own difficulties. Conflicts with an old friend, an obsession with dieting, etc... Do you have a story you want to understand better? Please write it down below!

Questions.Title: Questions to Think About
Questions.NoQuestionPlaceholder: Choose one of the questions from the list below to think about.

Tooltip.NewThread: Click to open a new thread with this theme.

Synthesis.Title: AI Summary
Synthesis.CompleteMessage: The session has ended. Thank you :).
Synthesis.BackToExplore: Go back to the Exploration Page
Synthesis.FinalReflection: Through this exploration, what have you learned or newly realized about yourself and your situation? Feel free to write down whatever comes to mind.
